text: Garrett Gonzalez Morris (born February 1, 1937) is an American comedian, educator, and actor. He was part of the original cast of the sketch comedy program Saturday Night Live, appearing from 1975 to 1980. He also starred as Earl the Cashier on the sitcom 2 Broke Girls. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from New Orleans Category:Educators from New Orleans Category:Actors from New Orleans
title: Garrett Morris
